R

Raka - Class in monsters
A monster subclass.
Raka() - Constructor for class monsters.Raka
Creates Raka object by calling superclass constructor and passing in the default values
random() - Method in class main.ItemInventory
Get a random non fainted item from the inventory.
random() - Method in class main.MonsterInventory
Get a random non fainted monster from the inventory.
RandomEvent - Class in main
Handles all random events that happen over night.
RandomEvent() - Constructor for class main.RandomEvent
Creates RandomEvent object
randomise() - Method in class main.BattleInventory
Populate the inventory by randomly generating battles.
randomise() - Method in class main.ItemInventory
Populate the inventory by randomly selecting items from all items in the game.
randomise() - Method in class main.MonsterInventory
Populate the inventory by randomly selecting monsters from all monsters in the game.
randomise() - Method in class main.Shop
Randomize the monsters and items in the shop.
randomMonsterJoin() - Method in class main.RandomEvent
Random monster joins the player's team based on the joinChance
randomMonsterLeave(Monster) - Method in class main.RandomEvent
Monster leaves the player's team based on the leaveChance
randomMonsterLevelUp(Monster) - Method in class main.RandomEvent
Level up given Monster object based on the levelUpChance
randomName() - Method in class main.Battle
get a random battle name from the given file
randomSize() - Method in class main.Battle
get a random number between 1 and the maximum numbers of monsters that the player can have
refreshMonsters() - Method in class gui.FightScreen
Refresh the monster buttons to update their health.
resetDayBattles() - Method in class main.Score
Set dayBattlesWon and dayBattlesLost to zero
run() - Method in class main.CommandLine
Print the home page and run the main command line loop.
runAllRandom() - Method in class main.RandomEvent
Runs randomMonsterLevelUp based on the number of monsters in the player's team Runs randomMonsterLeave based on the number of monsters in the player's team but stops when there is only 1 monster in the team Runs randomMonsterJoin based on the number of free slots in the player's team
